about_the_game:
《XiuzhenWorld》 is a 3D world where your goal is to level up from a mere mortal into an immortal at the end.
Its a semi-idle game with fun immortal cultivation mechanics such as
- leveling up to become stronger.
- capturing monsters as pets to fight for you.
- killing monsters & comparing the stats of different equipment loot you get.
- over 10 different combat skills which get unlocked as you level up to kill monsters even faster.
- upgrading your weapons to become more powerful with currency you collect from monsters.
- opening treasure chests which drop from monsters, these treasure chests provide random drops, see how lucky you are.
- Reincarnation to come back stronger with better base stats.
- The game comes with a built-in AFK(Away From Keybourd) function.

Please note there is no storyline for this game, the core gameplay is mainly about killing monsters in the endless battleground and praying you get better equipment drops from these monsters.Its meant to be played as an idler game, with a few minutes required every few hours to check equipment drops your character got while you are working. Try this immortal cultivation idler game which has auto hack and slash combat.
